summary: Delivers a standard stylesheet for visualizing quantum pulse sequences, creating stepwise waveform envelopes with LaTeX pulse names, applying phase modulation, rendering frameâ€‘change symbols with formatted operands, displaying chart titles with scaling factors, and showing snapshots and barriers while omitting acquire channels and ordering channels by index with control channels appended.
business_intent: Provide a consistent, readable visual representation of quantum pulse programs to aid analysis, debugging, and documentation.
